title: Sweet Potato Hash
description: Gluten Free, Higher Fiber, Low Carb / Diabetes Friendly, Lower Saturated Fat, Lower Sodium
cleaned_text: Sweet Potato Hash A sweet twist to the original, but lower in calories, fat and sodium. Serves: 8 (Serving Size = 3/4 cup) Ingredients - 1 Tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil - 5 cups peeled and cubed sweet potato - 1 cup diced white or yellow onion - 1 pound uncooked lean ground turkey breakfast sausage - 1 Tablespoon chopped fresh rosemary - ½ Tablespoon minced garlic - ¼ teaspoon ground black pepper - 1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg Directions - Place olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Sauté potato and onion for 5-7 minutes stirring occasionally. - Add ground turkey and break into small pieces, cooking another 3-4 minutes. - Add herbs and spices and stir to combine. Continue cooking until turkey is no longer pink. - Serve with "fried" egg on top if desired.
